recommended_degree: Akuntansi, Akuntansi Keuangan Perusahaan, Akuntansi Keuangan Publik, Akuntansi Lembaga Keuangan Syariah, Akuntansi Manajemen (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
Overview
The Accounting Intern will support the Finance & Accounting team in daily financial administration, data reconciliation, and basic reporting activities. This role is ideal for fresh graduates who want to gain hands-on experience in accounting processes within a fast-paced FMCG environment.

Responsibilities
• Assist in recording daily financial transactions (AP/AR).
• Verify and check supporting financial documents.
• Support bank reconciliation and other account reconciliations.
• Input financial data into the accounting system accurately.
• Assist in preparing monthly financial reports (draft/basic level).
• Maintain and organize financial documents and archives.
• Support internal audit preparation by providing required documentation.
• Coordinate with related teams to ensure data completeness.
• Assist with other administrative tasks as needed.

Qualifications
• Fresh graduate or final-year student majoring in Accounting/Finance.
• Detail-oriented, organized, and comfortable working with large data sets.
• Proficient in Microsoft Excel and familiar with basic formulas.
• Basic understanding of journal entries, AP/AR, and the accounting cycle.
• Able to work in a fast-paced and detail-focused environment.
• Willing to learn, with good communication skills.
